installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Clipable Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y --no-install-recommends curl nginx nodejs npm supervisor git
npm install -g pnpm

cd /mnt/server

# Set environment variables for optimal performance
export GOMAXPROCS=4
export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=14336

# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/Qiiks/Clipable-Custom.git .

# Build backend with optimization flags
cd backend
go build -o clipable -ldflags="-s -w" -tags=muslc

# Build frontend
cd ../frontend
pnpm install
NODE_ENV=production pnpm build

# Copy configuration files
cp ../nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
cp ../supervisord.conf ./supervisord.conf
